/* arm1000DAO.selectArm1000AlarmList - 사용자 쪽지 목록 가져오기 */ SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN,Z.* FROM ( SELECT A.ARM_ID, A.USR_ID, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.USR_ID, '1') AS USR_NM, A.SEND_USR_ID, SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.SEND_USR_ID, '1') AS SEND_USR_NM, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.VIEW_CHECK, A.DEL_CHECK, A.REQ_IDS, A.REG_DTM, A.CHECK_DTM, A.DEL_DTM
FROM ARM1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.DEL_CHECK = 'N' ORDER BY A.VIEW_CHECK DESC, A.REG_DTM DESC, A.CHECK_DTM ) Z ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
AND B.SEND_USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND B.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND B.REQ_IDS LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND B.VIEW_CHECK = #searchCd#

/* arm1000DAO.selectArm1000AlarmCnt - 사용자 쪽지 갯수 조회 */ SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*),0) AS ALL_CNT,COALESCE(COUNT(DECODE(A.VIEW_CHECK,'02',1)),0) AS VIEW_CNT FROM (SELECT Z.*,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(Z.SEND_USR_ID, '1') AS SEND_USR_NM FROM ARM1000 Z) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.DEL_CHECK = 'N'
AND A.SEND_USR_NM LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.TITLE LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.REQ_IDS LIKE '%' || #searchTxt# || '%'
AND A.VIEW_CHECK = #searchCd#

/* arm1000DAO.insertArm1000AlarmInfo - 쪽지 ID 생성 */ SELECT COALESCE( SUBSTR(ARM_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(ARM_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'ARM' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_ARM_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(ARM_ID) AS ARM_ID FROM ARM1000 )
/* arm1000DAO.insertArm1000AlarmInfo - 쪽지 등록 */ INSERT INTO ARM1000 ( ARM_ID, USR_ID, SEND_USR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, VIEW_CHECK, DEL_CHECK, REQ_IDS, REG_DTM ) VALUES ( #newArmId#, #usrId#, #sendUsrId#, #title#, #content#, '02', 'N', #reqIds#, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

/* arm1000DAO.updateArm1000AlarmInfo - 쪽지 수정 (삭제 또는 읽음 처리) */ UPDATE ARM1000 A SET
VIEW_CHECK = #viewCheck#, CHECK_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
DEL_CHECK = #delCheck#, DEL_DTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE 1=1 AND A.ARM_ID = #armId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId#

FROM ARM1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ARM_ID = #armId# AND A.USR_ID = #usrId# AND A.DEL_CHECK = 'N'
